original_solution_mapping.L1: Per week, one cow produces 108 liters / 6 cows = <<108/6=18>>18 liters/cow.
original_solution_mapping.L2: The cows produced 2160 liters of milk over 5 weeks. So we have 2160 liters / 18 liters/cow = <<2160/18=120>>120 cows.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Further, we have to divide 120 cows / 5 weeks = <<120/5=24>>24 cows.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 848.
    Returns: the number of cows on the farm.
    """
    # L1
    liters_per_group = 108 # 108 liters of milk per week
    cows_per_group = 6 # every 6 cows
    liters_per_cow_per_week = liters_per_group / cows_per_group

    # L2
    total_liters_produced = 2160 # 2160 liters of milk
    intermediate_cow_value = total_liters_produced / liters_per_cow_per_week

    # L3
    number_of_weeks = 5 # In five weeks
    actual_cows_on_farm = intermediate_cow_value / number_of_weeks

    # FA
    answer = actual_cows_on_farm
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Per week, one cow produces {liters_per_group} liters / {cows_per_group} cows = <<{liters_per_group}/{cows_per_group}={liters_per_cow_per_week}>>{liters_per_cow_per_week} liters/cow.

The cows produced {total_liters_produced} liters of milk over 5 weeks. So we have {total_liters_produced} liters / {liters_per_cow_per_week} liters/cow = <<{total_liters_produced}/{liters_per_cow_per_week}={intermediate_cow_value}>>{intermediate_cow_value} cows.
Further, we have to divide {intermediate_cow_value} cows / {number_of_weeks} weeks = <<{intermediate_cow_value}/{number_of_weeks}={actual_cows_on_farm}>>{actual_cows_on_farm} cows.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Per week, one cow produces 108 liters / 108 cows = <<108/108=1>>1 liters/cow.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: The cows produced 2160 liters of milk over 5 weeks. So we have 2160 liters / 1 liters/cow = <<2160/1=2160>>2160 cows.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Further, we have to divide 2160 cows / 5 weeks = <<2160/5=432>>432 cows.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'liters_per_group' (108) was used instead of 'cows_per_group' (6).
